AN AUSTIN-BASED NATIVE iOS SWIFT DEVELOPER

Understanding the relationship between form and function
is one of the qualities that make an exceptional iOS Developer.
It is important not only to be able to write succint code, but to also see from the angle
of the designer and people using your app to fuse together
a seemless, human-centered app design.

iRECYCLE ATX

Never forget if this week is recycling ever again! Let's be honest, sometimes we forget if it's this week or not. Look no further! Simply pull out your phone, open the app, and find out right away without looking to your neighbor who also might be just as confused as you!

(Coming soon to the app store)

P4K REVIEWS

This is a quick, sleek reader app that pulls the most up-to-date album reviews posted by Pitchfork music blog. This app is rated higher than any apps currently released by the blog
